title: Building the AI-First Ecosystem
challenge: Cronomind needed to enter a saturated CRM market. The challenge was to position them not just as a tool, but as an intelligent partner that automates business logic.
solution: We architected a brand identity centered around 'The AI Workforce.' We built a custom Python-based backend that integrated with the marketing site to demonstrate live automation during the demo phase.

title: The 'Unparent' Viral Movement
challenge: Mental health marketing often feels clinical and cold. Kindled needed to reach parents of toddlers in a way that felt supportive, not judgmental.
solution: We launched 'Unparent'â€”an offline camp supported by an emotional digital campaign. We used raw, unfiltered parenting stories on Instagram to build community trust before the event launch.

title: Scaling Startup User Acquisition
challenge: Dotco had a great MVP but zero users. They needed rapid acquisition with a very limited budget.
solution: We implemented a 'High-Velocity Testing' framework. Running micro-campaigns across SEM and Social to find the lowest cost-per-acquisition (CPA) channel, then scaling it aggressively.
